subject: 1ZJ455510407694090
description_text:
Good morning,
Order 1ZJ455510407694090 is currently held at UPS with no delivery date.
I will not be able to receive the order after the 23rd, so the return process to the seller will begin.
I would like to purchase the product, but I have no information about the shipping company.
Could you please contact UPS to arrange delivery before December 23, 2025?

Regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Alonso Moreno,  OK, WE WILL CHECK IT.
